verbs.description: [ARG1: at least 6] [V: killed] [ARGM-TMP: as amtrak train derails on new faster route] an amtrak train making the first - ever run along a faster new route hurtled off an overpass south of seattle on monday and spilled some of its cars onto the highway below killing at least three people injuring dozens and crushing two vehicles authorities said university of washington amtrak federal railroad administration british columbia puget sound medical care dr nathan selden copenhagen portland oregon lakewood washington
